title: Pedestrian-oriented development in Beirut: A framework for estimating urban design impacts on pedestrian flows through modeling, participatory design, and scenario analysis
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 149

Author(s): Andres Sevtsuk, Justin Kollar, Daniel Pratama, Rounaq Basu, Jawad Haddad, Abdulaziz Alhassan, Bahij Chancey, Mohamad Halabi, Rawad Makhlouf, Maya Abou-Zeid
